text: ohn, I urgently need to talk to someone, and you're the only one I can trust with this. Last Thursday night, I was involved in a car accident on my way back from work. Thankfully, I wasn't hurt, but the other driver was injured, and it's all I've been able to think about since. The whole experience has left me shaken, and I find myself reliving those moments constantly. It's been really tough to process this on my own...
Thanks for listening, John. I don't know what I'd do without you. Let's talk more at school.
I'm looking forward to the arcade, it'll be a good distraction. Thanks for inviting me.
